parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Rounds up or down to the closest integer.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''round''' x

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> x: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name> x1 </name>=<value><ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_val= round 5.25, result is 5</inner><close></pre></close></ext>
</value></part><part><name> x2 </name>=<value><ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_val= round 5.55, result is 6</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name> </name>=<value> Example 2

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ceil]], [[floor]], [[linearConversion]], [[Math Commands]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 23, 2018 - 05:21 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:feint|feint]]</dt>
<dd class="note"> If you want to round to a specific place past the decimal point, use [[toFixed]] and [[parseNumber]] together.<br><br>For example:
<code>[[parseNumber]] (3.16666 [[toFixed]] 1); // 3.2</code>
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 3, 2018 - 21:33 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Before [[toFixed]] <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66</value></part></template> and [[parseNumber]] <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template>, you could round with decimals with a dirty little "hack":
 ([[round]] (([[getDir]] [[player]]) * 100)) / 100
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
